verses.padam: - Padam raśmiḥ|asi|kṣayAya|tvA|kṣaya̱m|jinva|prEtiriti̍ pra - itiḥ|asi|dharmAya|tvA|dharma̱m|jinva|anvi̍tirityanu̍# - itiḥ|asi|divE|tvA|diva̱m|jinva|sandhiriti# saM - dhiḥ|asi|antarikṣAya|tvA|antari̍kṣam|jinva|pratidhiriti̍# prati-dhiḥ|asi|pRuthivyai|tvA|pRuthivIm|jinva|viṣṭaBaM iti# vi-staBaMḥ|asi|vRuṣṭyai̱|tvA|vRuṣṭi̱m|jinva|pravEti# pra - vA|asi|ahnE̱|tvA|ahaḥ|jinva|anuvEtya̍nu̍ - vA|asi|rAtriyai|tvA|rAtri̱m|jinva|uśik|asi|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: raśmirasi̍ kṣayAya̍ tvA kṣayaM̍ jinva prEtirasi̍ dharmAya̍ tvA dharmaM̍ jinvAnvitirasi̍ divE tvA divaM̍ jinva sandhirasyantari̍kṣAya̍ tvA&ntarikṣaM̍ jinva pratidhirasi̍ pRuthivyai tvA# pRuthivIM jinva̍ viṣṭaBOM&si̍ vRuṣṭyai̱ tvA vRuṣṭiM̍ jinva pravA&syahnE tvA&harjinvAnu̍ vA&si rAtriyai̍ tvA rAtriM̍ jinvO śigasi̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam vasuBya̍ iti vasu# - Byaḥ|tvA|vasUn|jinva|prakEta̍ iti# pra - kEtaḥ|asi|rudrEByaḥ|tvA|rudrAn|jinva|sudItiriti̍# su- dItiḥ|asi|AdityEByaḥ|tvA|AdityAn|jinva|Oja̍ḥ|asi|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|tvA|pitRUn|jinva|tantuḥ|asi|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jinva|pRutanAṣAṭ|asi|paśuBya iti# paśu - Byaḥ|tvA|paśUn|jinva|rEvat|asi|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIḥ|jinva|aBijiditya̍Bi̍ - jit|asi|yuktagrAvEti# yukta - grAvA|indrAya|tvA|indra̱m|jinva|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|asi|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasuByastvA̍ vasU̱~jjinva prakEtO&si̍ rudrEByastvA̍ rudrA~jjinva̍ sudItirasyAdityEBya̍stvA̍ &&dityA~jjinvaujO&si̍ pitRuByastvA̍ pitRU~jjinva̍ tanturasi̍ prajAByastvA̍ prajA jinva̍ pRutanAṣAḍasi̍ paśuByastvA̍ paśU~jjinva̍ rEvadasyOṣadhIBya-stvauṣa̍dhI-rjinvABijida̍si̍ yuktagrAvEndrAya̍ tvEndraM̍ jinvAdhipatirasi̍ prAṇAya# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|jinva|yantA|asi|apAnAyEtyapa̍ - anAya|tvA|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|jinva|saṃqsarpa iti# saM - sarpaḥ|asi|cakṣu̍ṣE|tvA|cakṣu̍ḥ|jinva|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayO - dhAḥ|asi|śrOtrAya|tvA|śrOtra̱m|jinva|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|asi|pravRuditi# pra - vRut|asi|saM~MvRuditi# saM - vRut|asi|vivRuditi vi - vRut|asi|saṃqrOha iti# saM - rOhaḥ|asi|nIrOha iti# niḥ - rOhaḥ|asi|prarOha iti# pra - rOhaḥ|asi|anurOha ityanu̍ - rOhaḥ|asi|vasukaḥ|asi|vEṣaśririti̍ vEṣa# - śriḥ|asi|vasyaṣṭiḥ|asi||3̍ (43) (uśigasi̍ - prAṇAya - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: tvA prAṇaM jinva̍ yantA&syapAnAya̍# tvA&pAnaM jinva̍ saṃqsarpO&si̍ cakṣuṣE̍ tvA cakṣurjinva̍ vayOdhA asi̍ śrOtrAya̍ tvA śrOtraM̍ jinva trivRudasi̍ pravRudasi̍ saM~MvRudasi̍ vivRudasi̍ saṃrOhO&si̍ nIrOhO&si̍ prarOhO̱&syanurOhO&si̍ vasukO&si̍ vEṣaśrirasi̍ vasyaṣṭirasi||3̍ (uśigasi̍ - prAṇAya - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam rAjñI̱|asi|prAcI̱|dik|vasavaḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|agniḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti# prati - dhartA|trivRuditi# tri-vRut|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|Ajya̱m|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|sAma|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|asi|dakṣiṇA|dik|rudrAḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhipataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|indraḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|pra̍ ugam|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|bRuhat|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|samrAḍiti# saM - rAṭ|asi|pratIcI̱|dik|4 (50)
verses.samhita: rAjñyasi̍ prAcI digvasavastE̍ dEvA adhipatayO&gniṛhE̍tInAM̍ pratidhartA̍# trivRut tvA stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatvAjya̍-mukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu rathantaraṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityai̍ virAḍasi̍ dakṣiṇA digrudrAstE# dEvA adhipataya̍ indrO# hEtInAM pratidhartA̍ pa~jcadaśastvA̍ stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ pra-ugamukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu bRuhath sAma pratiṣṭhityai̍ samrAḍasi̍ pratIcI di- [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhipataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|sOmaḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|marutvatIya̱m|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|vairUpam|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|asi|udIcI|dik|viśvE̱|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|varuṇaḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|tvA|stOma̍ḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|niṣkE̍valyam|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|vairAjam|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|adhipatnItyadhi̍# - patnI|asi|bRuhatI|dik|marutaḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|5 (50)
verses.samhita: gAdityAstE̍# dEvA adhipatayaḥ̍ sOmO# hEtInAM pratidhartA̍ saptadaśastvA̍ stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ marutvatIyamuktha-mavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu vairUpaṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityAyai̍ svarAḍasyudIcI̍ dig viśvE# tE dEvA adhipatayO̍ varuṇO̍ hEtInAm pratidhartaika̍viṃqśa̍ stvA stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ niṣkEvalya-mukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu vairAjaṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityA̍ adhipatnyasi̍ bRuhatI di~gmarutastE̍ dEvA adhipatayO̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAviti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśau|tvA|stOmau̱|pRuthivyAm|śrayatAm|vaiśvadEvAgnimArutE iti# vaiśvadEva-agnimArutE|ukthE iti|avya̍thayantI̍ iti|staBnItAm|śAkvararaivatE̍ iti# śAkvara - raivatE|sAmanI̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|antarikṣAya|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|tvA|prathamajA̍ iti# prathama - jAḥ|dEvEṣu|divaḥ|mAtra̍yA|variṇA|prathantu|vidhartEti̍# vi - dhartA|ca|ayam|adhipatirityadhi̍-patiḥ|ca|tE|tvA|sarvE̱|saM~MvidAnA̍ iti# saM - vidAnAḥ|nAkasya|pRuṣṭhE|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|yajamAnam|ca|sAdayantu||6̍ (40) (pratIcI di~g - marutastE̍ dEvA adhipataya̍ - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatiṛhEtInAM̍ pratidhartA̍ triṇavatrayastriṃqśau̍ tvA stOmau# pRuthivyAṅ śrayatAM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvAgnimArutE ukthE avyathayantI̍ staBnItAṃ śAkvararaivatE sAmanI̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ antarikṣAyaṛṣa̍yastvA̍ prathamajA dEvEṣu# divO mAtrayA̍ variṇA prathantu̍ vidhartA cAyamadhipatiśca̍ tE tvA sarvE# saM~MvidAnA nAkasya̍ pRuṣṭhE suvargE̍ lOkE yajamAnaM̍ ca sAdayantu||6 (pratIcI di~g - marutastE̍ dEvA adhipataya̍ - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ayam|puraḥ|harikEśa̍ iti hari# - kEśaḥ|sUryaraśmiriti̍ sUrya# - raśmiḥ|tasya|rathagRuthsa̍ iti# ratha - gRuthsaḥ|ca|rathaujA̍ iti ratha# - OjAḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|pu~jjikasthalEti# pu~jjika - sthalA|ca|kRutasthalEti# kRuta - sthalA|ca|aPsarasau̱|yAtudhAnA iti# yAtu - dhAnA̱ḥ|hEtiḥ|rakṣAṃsi|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra-hEtiḥ|ayam|dakṣiṇA|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tasya|rathasvana̍ iti# ratha - svanaḥ|ca|rathEcitra̍ iti rathE̱ - citraḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|mEnakA|ca|sahajanyEti# saha - janyA|ca|aPsarasau̱|da~gṇavaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|hEtiḥ|pauru̍ṣEyaḥ|vadhaḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|paścAt|viśvavyacA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|tasya|ratha̍prOta̍ iti ratha-prOtaḥ|ca|asa̍maratha̍ ityasama̍ - rathaḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|pramlOcantIti# pra - mlOcantI|ca|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayaM purO harikEśaḥ̍ sUryaraśmistasya̍# rathagRuthsaśca rathaujAśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# pu~jjikasthalA ca# kRutasthalA cA̱Psarasau# yAtudhAnA# hEtI rakṣAṃsi̍ prahEti̍ rayaM dakṣiṇA̍ viśva karmA̍ tasya# rathasvanaśca rathEcitraśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# mEnakA ca# sahajanyA cA̱Psarasau# da~gṇavaḥ̍ paśavO# hEtiḥ pauruṣEyO̍ vadhaḥ prahEti̍ rayaM paścAd viśvavyacA̍ stasya ratha# prOtaścA-samarathaśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau̱ pramlOcantI̍ cA -[ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam anumlOcantItyanu̍ - mlOcantI|ca|aPsarasau̱|sarpAḥ|hEtiḥ|vyAGrAḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|uttarAdityut-tarAt|saMq~Myadva̍suriti̍# saM~Myat - vasuḥ|tasya|sEnajiditi̍# sEna-jit|ca|suṣEṇa iti# su - sEnaḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyA̍viti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|viśvAcI̱|ca|GRutAcI̱|ca|aPsarasau̱|Apaḥ|hEti|vAta̍ḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|upari|arvAgva̍surityarvAk̍ - vasuḥ|tasya|tArkṣya̍ḥ|ca|ari̍ṣṭanEmirityari̍ṣṭa̍ - nEmiḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|urvaśI̱|ca|pUrvacittiriti̍# pUrva - cittiḥ|ca|aPsarasau̱|vidyuditi# vit - yut|hEtiḥ|avasPUrjannityava̍ - sPUrjann|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|tEByaḥ|nama̍ḥ|tE|naḥ|mRuḍayantu|tE|yam|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: numlOcantI-cAPsarasau̍# sarpA hEti rvyAGrAḥ prahEti̍ raya muttarAth̍ saMya~Md- vasustasya̍# sEnajicca# suṣEṇaśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# viśvAcI# ca GRutAcI# cAPsarasA vApO# hEti rvAtaḥ prahEti̍ rayamuparya rvAgva-sustasya̍ tArkṣya-ścAriṣṭa-nEmiśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyA# vurvaśI# ca pUrvacittiścA-Psarasau̍# vidyuddhEtira-vasPUrjan̍ prahEti̍ stEByO namastE nO# mRuḍayantu tE yaM - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣṭi|tam|vaḥ|jaMBE̱|dadhAmi|AyOḥ|tvA|sada̍nE|sAdayAmi|ava̍taḥ|CAyAyA̱m|nama̍ḥ|samudrAya̍|nama̍ḥ|samudrasya̍|cakṣa̍sE|paramEṣṭhI|tvA|sAdayatu|divaḥ|pRuṣṭhE|vyaca̍svatIm|pratha̍svatIm|viBUma̍tImiti̍# vi - BUmatIm|praBUma̍tImiti̍# pra - BUmatIm|pariBUma̍tImiti̍# pari - BUmatIm|diva̱m|yacCa|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|diva̱m|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|udAnAyEtyu̍t̍ - anAya|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|caritrAya|sUrya̍ḥ|tvA|aBIti̍|pAtu|mahyA|svastyA̍ ( )|CardiṣA̱|śantamEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||prOtha̍t|aśva̍ḥ|na|yava̍sE|aviṣyann|yadA|mahaḥ|saM~Mvara̍ṇAditi̍# saM - varaṇAt|vyasthAditi̍# vi - asthA̱t||At|asya|vAtaḥ|anviti̍|vAti|śOciḥ|adha̍|sma|tE|vraja̍nam|kRuṣṇam|asti||9̍ (78) (pramlOcantI̍ ca - yaṅ - svastyA - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: dviṣmO yaśca# nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvO jaMBE# dadhAmyAyOstvA sadanE̍ sAdayAmyavata̍ śCAyAyAM namaḥ̍ samudrAya namaḥ̍ samudrasya cakṣasE̍ paramEṣṭhI tvA# sAdayatu divaḥ pRuṣṭhE vyacasvatIM̍ prathasvatIM̍ ~MviBUmatIM̍ praBUmatIM̍ pariBUmatIM̍ divaM̍ ~MyacCa divaM̍ dRuṃha divaM mA hiṃsIrviśva̍smai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍# vyAnAyOdAnAya̍# pratiṣṭhAyai# caritrAya̍ sUryastvA&Bi̍ pAtu̍ mahyA svastyA ( ) CardiṣA śantamEna̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvA̍ sIda||prOthadaśvO̍ na yavasE̍ aviṣyan. yadA mahaḥ sa~MvaraṇAd̍ vyasthA̱t|Adasya̍ vAtO anu# vAti śOciradha# sma tE vrajanaM̍ kRuṣṇamasti||9̍ (pramlOcantI̍ ca - yaṅ - svastyA - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|mUd^^rdhA|divaḥ|kakut|patiḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|ayam||apAm|rEtAṃ̍si|jinvati||tvAm|agnE|puṣka̍rAt|adhIti̍|atha̍rvA|niriti̍|amanthata||mUd^^rdhnaḥ|viśva̍sya|vAGata̍ḥ||ayam|agniḥ|sahasriṇa̍ḥ|vAja̍sya|śatina̍ḥ|pati̍ḥ||mUd^^rdhA|kaviḥ|rayIṇAm||Buva̍ḥ|yajñasya̍|raja̍saḥ|ca|nEtA|yatra̍|niyudBiriti̍# niyut - Biḥ|sacasE|śivABi̍ḥ||divi|mUd^^rdhAna̱m|dadhiṣE|suvarq.ṣAmiti̍# suvaḥ - sAm|jihvAm|agnE|cakRuṣE|havyavAhamiti# havya - vAha̱m||abAdhi|agniḥ|samidhEti̍# sam - idhA̱|janAnAm|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirmUrddhA divaḥ kakut patiḥ̍ pRuthivyA ayaM|apAṃ rEtAṃsi̍ jinvati||tvAmagnE̍ puṣkarAdaddhyatha̍rvA̍ niramanthata|mUrddhnO̍ viśvasya̍ vAGataḥ||ayamagniḥ̍ sahasriṇO̍ vAjasya̍ śatinaspatiḥ|mUrddhA̍ kavI rayIṇAM||BuvO̍# yajñasya rajasaśca̍ nEtA yatrA# niyudBiḥ sacasE̍ śivABiḥ|divi̍ mUrddhAnaM̍ dadhiṣE suvarq.ṣAM jihvAmagnE̍ cakRuṣE havyavAha̱M||abO̱ddhyagniḥ samidhA janAnAM̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|dhEnum|iva|AyatImityA̱̍ - yatIm|uṣAsa̱m||yahvAḥ|iva|prEti|vayAm|ujjihA̍nA̍ ityut̍ - jihAnAḥ|prEti̍|BAnava̍ḥ|sisratE|nAka̱m|acCa̍||avO̍cAma|kavayE̱|mEddhyA̍ya|vaca̍ḥ|vandAru̍|vRuṣaBAya̍|vRuṣṇE̱||gavi̍ṣṭhiraḥ|nama̍sA|stOma̱m|agnau|divi|iva|rukmam|urvya~jca̱m|aśrEt||jana̍sya|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|ajaniṣṭa|jAgRuviḥ|agniḥ|sudakṣa̍ iti# su - dakṣaḥ|suvitAya̍|navya̍sE||GRutapra̍tIka̍ iti# GRuta - pratIkaḥ|bRuhatA|divispRuśEti# divi - spRuśA̱|dyumaditi# dyu - mat|vIti|BAti|BaratEBya̍ḥ|śuci̍ḥ||tvAm|agnE|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# dhEnumivA̍ yatImuṣAsa̱M|yahvA iva̍ pravayA mujjihAnAḥ̍ pra BAnavaḥ̍ sisratE nAkamacCa||avO̍cAma̍ kavayE mEddhyAya̍ vacO# vandAru# vRuṣaBAya vRuṣṇE̱|gaviṣṭhirO̍ namasA̍ stOmamagnau̍ divIva# rukmamurvya~jcamaśrEt||jana̍sya̍ gOpA ajaniṣṭa̍ jAgRuviragniḥ̍ sudakṣaḥ̍ suvitAya navyasE|GRutapra̍tIkO̍ bRuhatA divispRuśA̱̍ dyumadvi BAti̍ BaratEByaḥ śuciḥ||tvAma̍gnE̍ a~ggirasO̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam guhA̱|hitam|anviti|avindann|śiśriyAṇam|vanE̍vana̍ iti vanE̱ - vanE||saḥ|jAyasE|mathyamAnaḥ|saha̍ḥ|mahat|tvAm|Ahuḥ|saha̍saḥ|putram|a~ggiraḥ||yajñasya̍|kEtum|prathamam|purOhi̍tamiti̍# puraḥ - hitam|agnim|naraḥ|triṣadhastha̍ iti# tri - sadhasthE|samiti|indhatE||indrE̍ṇa|dEvaiḥ|sarathamiti̍# sa - ratha̱m|saḥ|barqḥiṣi|sIda̍t|nIti̍|hOtA̱|yajathA̍ya|sukraturiti̍# su - kratuḥ||tvAm|citraśravastamEti̍# citraśravaḥ-tama|havantE|vikṣu|jantava̍ḥ||śOciṣkE̍śamiti̍# śOciḥ - kEśam|purupriyEti# puru - priya|agnE̱|havyAya|vOḍha̍vE||saKA̍yaḥ|samiti̍|vaḥ|samya~jca̱m|iṣa̱m|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: guhA# hitamanva-vinda~jCiśriyAṇaM̍ ~MvanEvanE|sa̍ jAyasE̍ mathyamAnaḥ̍ sahO# mahat tvAmAhuḥ̍ sahasasputrama̍~ggiraḥ||yajñasya̍# kEtuM prathamaM̍ purOhitamagniM̍ narastriṣadhasthE̍ samindhatE|indrE̍ṇa̍ dEvaiḥ sarathaṃq sa barqḥiṣi sIdanni hOtA# yajathAya̍ sukratuḥ||tvAM̍ citraśravastama̍ havantE̍ vikṣu jantavaḥ|śOciṣkE̍śaM̍ purupriyAgnE# havyAya vOḍhavE||saKA̍yaḥ̍ saM~Mvaḥ̍ samya~jcamiṣaṅq - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam stOma̱m|ca|agnayE̱||vaṛṣiṣṭhAya|kṣitInAm|Urjaḥ|naptrE̱|saha̍svatE||saṃsamiti̍ sam - sam|it|yuvasE|vRuṣann|agnE̱|viśvAni|aryaḥ|A||iḍaḥ|padE|samiti̍|iddhyasE|saḥ|naḥ|vasU̍ni|Eti̍|Bara||EnA|vaḥ|agnim|nama̍sA|Urjaḥ|napA̍tam|Eti̍|huvE||priyam|cEti̍ṣṭham|aratim|svaddhvaramiti̍# su - addhvaram|viśvasya|dUtam|amRuta̱m||saḥ|yOjatE|aruṣaḥ|viśvaBO̍jasEti̍# viśva - BOjasA|saḥ|dudravat|svAhuta̍ iti su - Ahutaḥ||subrahmEti# su - brahmA̱|yajñaḥ|suśamIti# su - śamI̱|13 (50)
verses.samhita: stOmaM̍ cAgnayE̱|vaṛṣiṣṭhAya̍ kṣitInAmUrjO naptrE sahasvatE||saṃsamidyu̍vasE̍ vRuṣannagnE viśvA̱nyarya A|iḍaspadE samiddhyasE̍ sa nO vasUnyA Bara||EnA̍ vO# agniM namasOrjO̍ napAtamA̍ huvE|priyaM̍ cEtiṣṭhamaratiṅ̍ svaddhvaraM̍ ~Mviśvasya̍ dUtamamRuta̱M||sa yOjatE̍ aruṣO viśvaBOjasA̍ sa dudravath̍ svAhutaḥ|subrahmA̍# yajñaḥ suśamI - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vasUnAm|dEvam|rAdha̍ḥ|janA̍nAm||uditi̍|asya|śOciḥ|asthAt|AjuhvA̍nasyEtyA̱̍ - juhvAnasya|mIḍhuṣa̍ḥ||uditi̍|dhUmAsa̍ḥ|aruṣAsa̍ḥ|divispRuśa̍ iti# divi - spRuśaḥ|samiti̍|agnim|indhatE|nara̍ḥ||agnE̱|vAja̍sya|gOma̍ta̍ iti gO-mataḥ|IśAnaḥ|sahasaḥ|yahO̍ iti||asmE̍ iti|dhEhi|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|mahi|śrava̍ḥ||saḥ|idhAnaḥ|vasu̍ḥ|kaviḥ|agniḥ|IḍEnya̍ḥ|girA||rEvat|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|purvaṇIkEti# puru-anIka|dIdihi||kṣapaḥ|rAjann|uta|tmanA̱|agnE̱|vastO̱ḥ|uta|uṣasaḥ||saḥ|tigmajaBEMti̍# tigma - jaBaMq|14 (50)
verses.samhita: vasUnAM̍ dEvaṃ rAdhO janAnAM||uda̍sya̍ śOcirasthAdA-juhvA̍nasya̍ mIḍhuṣaḥ|uddhamAsO̍# aruṣAsO# divispRuśaḥ samagnimindhatE̍ naraḥ||agnE̍ vAjasya̍ gOmata̍ IśAnaḥ̍ sahasO yahO|asmE dhEhi̍ jAtavEdO mahi śravaḥ||sa̍ idhAnO̍ vasuṣkavi-ragnirIḍEnyO̍# girA|rEvadasmaByaM̍ purvaṇIka dIdihi||kṣapO rAjannuta̍ tmanA&gnE vastOrutOṣasa̍ḥ|sa̍ tigmajaMBa̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣasaḥ|daha|prati̍||Eti̍|tE|agnE|idhImahi|dyumantamiti̍# dyu - manta̱m|dEva|ajara̱m||yat|ha|syA|tE|panIyasI|samiditi̍# saM - it|dIdayati|dyavi̍|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya̍ iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||Eti̍|tE|agnE|RucA|haviḥ|śukrasya̍|jyOtiṣaḥ|patE||suścandrEti̍ su-candra|dasma|viśpa̍tE|havya̍vAḍiti̍ havya# - vAṭ|tuBya̱m|hUyatE|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||uBE̍ iti|suścandrEti̍# su - candra|sarpiṣaḥ|darvI̍ iti|śrIṇIṣE|Asani̍||utO̍ iti|naḥ|uditi̍|pupUryAḥ|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rakṣasO# daha prati||A̍ tE# agna idhImahi dyumantaM̍ dEvAjara̱M|yaddha syA tE panIyasI̍ samid-dIdayati̍ dyavIṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||A̍ tE# agna RucA haviḥ śukrasya# jyOtiṣaspatE|suścandra̍ dasma viśpatE̍ havyavAṭ̍ tuByaṃ# hUyata iṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||uBE̍ suścandra̍ sarpiṣO darvI̱ śrIṇIṣa Asani|utO̍ na ut pupUryA-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam ukthEṣu|śavasaḥ|patE|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya̍ iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||agnE̱|tam|adya|aśva̱m|na|stOmai̱ḥ|kratu̱m|na|Badram|hRudispRuśamiti̍# hRudi - spRuśa̱m||RuddhyAma|tE|Ohai̱ḥ||adha̍|hi|agnE|kratO̱ḥ|Badrasya̍|dakṣa̍sya|sAdhOḥ||rathIḥ|Rutasya̍|bRuhataḥ|baBUtha̍||ABiḥ|tE|adya|gIrBiḥ|gRuṇanta̍ḥ|agnE̱|dAśE̍ma||prEti̍|tE|divaḥ|na|stanayanti|śuṣmA̱ḥ||EBiḥ|naḥ|arkaiḥ|Bava̍|naḥ|arvA~g|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ukthEṣu# śavasaspata iṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||agnE̍ tamadyAśvaM na stOmaiḥ kratuM na Badraṃ hRudispRuśa̱M|RuddhyAmA̍# ta Ohai̱ḥ||adhA hyagnE̍ kratO̱rBadrasya dakṣasya̍ sAdhOḥ|rathIṛRutasya# bRuhatO baBUtha||ABiṣṭE̍# adya gIrBirgRuṇantO&gnE dAśEma|pra̍ tE# divO na stanayanti̍ śuṣmA̱ḥ||EBirnO# arkairBavA# nO arvA~gK - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam suvaḥ|na|jyOti̍ḥ||agnE̱|viśvE̍Biḥ|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|anIkaiḥ||agnim|hOtA̍ram|manyE|dAsva̍ntam|vasO̱ḥ|sUnum|saha̍saḥ|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam||vipra̱m|na|jAtavEdasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam||yaḥ|Ud^^rdhvayA̱|svaddhvara iti# su - addhvaraḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvAcyA̱|kRupA||GRutasya|viBrA̱ṣṭimiti̍ vi - BrAṣṭim|anviti|śukraśO̍ciṣa̍ iti# śukra - śOciṣaḥ|AjuhvAnasyEtyA̱̍ - juhvAnasya|sarpiṣa̍ḥ||agnE̱|tvam|naḥ|anta̍maḥ||uta|trAtA|śivaḥ|Bava|varUthya̍ḥ||tam|tvA|śOciṣṭha|dIdivaḥ||sumnAya̍|nUnam|ImahE|saKi̍Bya̍ iti saKi# - Byaḥ||vasuḥ|agniḥ|vasu̍śravA̍ iti vasu# - śravAḥ ( )||acCa|nakṣi|dyumatta̍ma̍ iti# dyumat - tamaḥ|rayim|dAḥ||17 (55) (janAnA̍ - ma~ggirasa̍ - iṣaṃ# - suśamI# - tigmajaMBa - pupUryA - arvA~g - vasuśravAḥ̍ - pa~jca# ca) (A4)
verses.samhita: suvarna jyOtiḥ|agnE̍ viśvEBiḥ̍ sumanA anIkaiḥ||agniṃ̍ hOtAraM̍ manyE dAsvantaM̍ ~MvasO̱ḥ sUnuṃ sahasO̍ jAtavEdasaM|vipraM̍ na jAtavEdasaM|ya̍ UrddhvayA̱ svaddhvarO dEvO dEvAcyA# kRupA|GRutasya viBrA̱ṣṭimanu# śukraśOciṣa̍ AjuhvAnasya̍ sarpiṣaḥ||agnE̍ tvaM nO antamaḥ|uta̍ trAtA śivO Bava̍ varUthyaḥ||taM̍ tvA# śOciṣṭha dIdivaḥ|sumnAya# nUnamImahE̍ saKiByaḥ||vasu̍ragnirvasu̍śravAḥ̍ ( )|acCA# nakṣi dyumattamO̍ rayiM dA̱ḥ||17

verses.padam: - Padam indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni - ByAm|tvA|sayujEti# sa - yujA̱|yujA|yunajmi|AGArAByAmityA̱-GArAByA̱m|tEjasA|varca̍sA|ukthEBi̍ḥ|stOmE̍Biḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|rayyai|pOṣAya|sajAtAnAmiti̍# sa-jAtAnA̱m|maddhyamasthEyAyEti# maddhyama-sthEyAya|mayA̱|tvA|sayujEti̍# sa-yujA̱|yujA|yunajmi|abAM|dulA|nitatniriti# ni - tatniḥ|aBrayantI|mEGaya̍ntI|varq.ṣaya̍ntI|cupuṇIkA̱|nAma̍|asi|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|tvA|viśvABiḥ|dhIBiḥ|upEti̍|dadhAmi|pRuthivI|udapuramityu̍da̍ - puram|annEna|viṣṭA|manuṣyA̱ḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|agniḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti# vi - yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrAgniByA̱M tvA sayujA# yujA yunajmyA̍ GArAByAM tEjasA̍ varcasO̍ kthEBiḥ stOmEBi̍ śCandOBI̍ rayyai pOṣAya̍ sajAtAnA̱M maddhyamasthEyAya̍ mayA̱ tvA sayujA# yujA yunajmyabAM̍ dulA nitatni̍ raBrayantI̍ mEGayantI̍ varq.ṣayantI̍ cupuṇIkA nAmAsi̍ prajApatinA̍ tvA viśvABirddhIBirupa̍# dadhAmi pRuthivyudapuramannE̍na̍ viṣṭA manuṣyA̱stE̍ gOptArO &gnirviyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra# padyE sA - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam mE|śarma|ca|varma̍|ca|astu|adhi̍dyaurityadhi̍# - dyauḥ|antarikṣam|brahma̍ṇA|viṣṭA|maruta̍ḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|vAyuḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti vi - yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|mE|śarma̍|ca|varma̍|ca|astu|dyauḥ|apa̍rAjitEtyapa̍rA̍ - jitA|amRutEna|viṣṭA|AdityAḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti vi-yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|mE|śarma̍|ca|varma̍|ca|astu||19̍ (48) (sA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: mE śarma# ca varma# cAstvadhi# dyaurantarikṣaM̍ brahmaṇA̍ viṣṭA marutastE̍ gOptArO# vAyurviyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra padyE̍ sA mE śarma# ca varma# cAstu dyauraparAjitA&mRutE̍na̍ viṣṭA&&dityAstE# gOptAraḥ sUryO viyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra padyE̍ sA mE śarma# ca varma# cAstu||19 (sA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|pRuthivyAḥ|pRuṣṭhE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|agniḥ|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tvA|sAdayatu|antarikṣasya|pRuṣṭhE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|vAyuḥ|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|divaḥ|pRuṣṭhE|jyOtiṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|paramEṣṭhI|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|purOvAtasaniriti# purOvAta - saniḥ|asya|aBrasaniritya̍Bra̍ - saniḥ|asi|vidyuthsaniriti̍# vidyut - saniḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatistvA̍ sAdayatu pRuthivyAḥ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCA-̍ gnistE&dhipati̍ rviśvakarmA̍ tvA sAdayatvantarikṣasya̍ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCa̍ vAyustE&dhipatiḥ̍ prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu divaḥ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCa̍ paramEṣṭhI tE&dhipatiḥ̍ purOvAtasanirasya̍ Brasanirasi̍ vidyuthsani# - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam asi|stanayitnusaniriti# stanayitnu - saniḥ|asi|vRuṣṭisaniriti̍# vRuṣṭi - saniḥ|asi|agnEḥ|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|agnEyAnItya̍gnE-yAnI̱|asi|vAyOḥ|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|vAyOyAnIti̍# vAyO - yAnI̱|asi|antarikṣasya|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|antarikṣayAnItya̍ntarikṣa̍ - yAnI̱|asi|antarikṣam|asi|antari̍kṣAya|tvA|salilAya̍|tvA|sarṇI̍kAya|tvA|satI̍kAyEti̍ sa - tIkAya|tvA|kEtAya|tvA|pracE̍tasa̍ iti pra - cEtasE|tvA|vivasvatE|tvA|divaḥ|tvA|jyOti̍ṣE|AdityEBya̍ḥ|tvA|RucE|tvA|rucE|tvA|dyutE|tvA̍ ( )|BAsE|tvA|jyOtiṣE|tvA|yaśOdAmiti̍# yaśaḥ-dAm|tvA|yaśasi|tEjOdAmiti̍# tEjaḥ - dAm|tvA|tEjasi|payOdAmiti̍# payaḥ - dAm|tvA|payasi|varcOdAmiti̍# varcaḥ-dAm|tvA|varcasi|draviṇOdAmiti̍# draviṇaḥ - dAm|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|tEna̍|Ruṣi̍ṇA|tEna̍|brahma̍ṇA|tayA̱|dEvata̍yA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||21̍ (79) (vidyuthsani# - rdyutE tvai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: -rasi stanayitnusanirasi̍ vRuṣṭisanirasya-gnEryAnya̍si̍ dEvAnAmagnE̍ yAnyasi̍ vAyOryAnyasi̍ dEvAnA̱M ~MvAyOyAnyasyantari̍kṣasya̍ yAnyasi̍ dEvAnA-̍ mantarikṣayAnyasya-ntari̍kṣamasyantari̍kṣAya̍ tvA salilAya# tvA sarṇIkAya̍ tvA satIkAya̍ tvA kEtAya̍ tvA pracEtasE̍ tvA vivasvatE̍ tvA divastvA jyOtiṣa̍ AdityEByastvarcE̍ tvA# rucE tvA̱ dyutE tvA# ( ) BAsE tvA jyOtiṣE̍ tvA yaśOdAM tvA yaśasi̍ tEjOdAM tvA tEjasi̍ payOdAM tvA payasi̍ varcOdAM tvA varcasi̍ draviṇOdAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi tEnaṛṣiṇA̍ tEna brahmaṇA̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIda||21̍ (vidyuthsani# - rdyutE tvai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam BUyaskRuditi# BUyaḥ - kRut|asi|varivaskRuditi# varivaḥ - kRut|asi|prAcI̱|asi|Ud^^rdhvA|asi|antarikṣasadityantarikṣa̍ - sat|asi|antarikṣE|sIda|aPsuṣaditya̍Psu̍ - sat|asi|śyEnasaditi# śyEna-sat|asi|gRuddhrasaditi# gRuddhra-sat|asi|suparṇasaditi# suparṇa - sat|asi|nAkasaditi# nAka - sat|asi|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|antari̍kṣasya|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|divaḥ|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|diśAm|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|draviṇOdAmiti̍# draviṇaḥ - dAm|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|ApAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|22 (50)
verses.samhita: BUyaskRudasi̍ varivaskRudasi̍ prAcyasyUrddhvA&sya̍-ntarikṣasada̍sya-ntari̍kṣE̍ sIdA-Psuṣadasi̍ śyEnasadasi̍ gRuddhrasadasi̍ suparṇasadasi̍ nAkasadasi̍ pRuthivyAstvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmya-ntarikṣasya̍ tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi divastvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi diśAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi draviṇOdAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi prAṇaM mE# pAhya-pAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam pAhi|Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|viśvAyuriti̍# viśva-Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|sarvAyuriti# sarva - Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|agnE̱|yat|tE|para̱m|hRut|nAma|tau|Eti̍|ihi|samiti̍|raBAvahai|pA~jca̍janyEṣviti̍ pA~jca# - janyEṣu|apIti|Edhi|agnE|yAvA̱ḥ|ayA̍vAḥ|EvA̱ḥ|UmA̱ḥ|sabda̍ḥ|saga̍raḥ|sumEka̍ iti# su - mEkaḥ||23̍ (32) (vyAnaM mE-dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: pAhyAyurmE̍ pAhi viśvAyurmE̍ pAhi sarvAyurmE̍ pAhyagnE yat tE paraṃq hRunnAma tAvEhi saṃ raBAvahai̍ pA~jca# janyEṣva-pyE̱ddhyagnE yAvA ayAvA̍ EvA UmAḥ sabdaḥ sagaraḥ̍ sumEkaḥ||23̍ (vyAnaM mE-dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agninA̱|viśvAṣAṭ|sUryEṇa|svarAḍiti̍# sva - rAṭ|kratvA̱|śacIpatiḥ|RuṣaBEṇa̍|tvaṣṭA̱|yajñEna̍|maGavAniti̍# maGa-vAn|dakṣiṇayA|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|manyunA̱|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|sauhA̱rdyEna|tanUdhA iti# tanU - dhAḥ|annEna|gaya̍ḥ|pRuthivyA|asanOt|RugBirityRu̍k̍ - Biḥ|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|Ruddhaḥ|sAmnA̱|tanUpA̍ iti# tanU - pAḥ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|jyOtiṣmAn|brahma̍ṇA|sOmapA̍ iti# sOma - pAḥ|gOBiḥ|yajñam|dAdhAra|kṣatrEṇa̍|manuṣyAn̍|aśvE̍na|ca|rathE̍na|ca|vajrI|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|praBuriti# pra - Buḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|tapasA|anA̍dhRuṣṭa̍ ityanA̱ - dhRuṣṭaḥ|sUryaḥ|sann|tanUBi̍ḥ||24̍ (49)
verses.samhita: agninA# viśvAṣAṭ sUryEṇa̍ svarAṭ kratvA śacIpatiṛ̍ RuṣaBEṇa tvaṣṭA# yajñEna# maGavAn dakṣiṇayA̍ suvargO manyunA# vRutrahA sauhA̱rdyEna tanUdhA annEna̍ gayaḥ̍ pRuthivyA&sanO̍ dRugBirannAdO̍ vaṣaṭkArEṇarddhaḥ̍ sAmnA# tanUpA virAjA jyOtiṣmAn̍ brahmaṇA̍ sOmapA gOBiryajñaM̍ dAdhAra̍ kṣatrEṇa# manuṣyA-naśvE̍na̍ ca rathEna̍ ca vajryRutuBi̍ḥ̍ praBuḥ saM~MvathsarEṇa̍# pariBU stapasA&nAdhRuṣṭaḥ̍ sUryaḥ san tanUBiḥ||24̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|manasA|andha̍ḥ|acCE̍ta̍ ityacCa# - itaḥ|dhAtA|dIkṣAyA̱m|savitA|BRutyAm|pUṣA|sOmakrayaṇyAmiti̍# sOma - krayaṇyAm|varu̍ṇaḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|asuraḥ|krIyamA̍ṇaḥ|mitraḥ|krItaḥ|śipiviṣṭa̍ iti# śipi - viṣṭaḥ|AsAdita̍ ityA - sAditaḥ|naraMdhiṣaḥ|prOhyamA̍ṇa̍ iti# pra - uhyamAṇaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|Aga̍ta̍ ityA - gataḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|praṇIyamAna̍ iti# pra-nIyamAnaḥ|agniḥ|AgnI̱ddhra̍ ityAgni-iddhrE|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|AgnI̱ddhrAdityAgni̍# - iddhrAt|praṇIyamAna̍ iti# pra - nIyamAnaḥ|indra̍ḥ|havid^^rdhAna̍ iti# haviḥ - dhAnE̱|aditiḥ|AsA̍dita̍ ityA - sAditaḥ|viṣṇuḥ|upAvahriyamA̍ṇa̍ ityupa̍ - avahriyamAṇaḥ|atha̍rvA|upO̱tta̍ ityupa# - uttaḥ|yamaḥ|aBiṣuta̍ ityaBi - sutaḥ|apUtapA ityapUta̍ - pAḥ|AdhUyamAna̍ ityA̱ - dhUyamAnaḥ|vAyuḥ|pUyamA̍naḥ|mitraḥ|kṣIraśrIriti̍# kṣIra-śrIḥ|manthI|saktuśrIriti# saktu - śrIḥ|vaiśvadEva iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|unnIta̍ ityut - nItaḥ|rudraḥ ( )|Ahuta̍ ityA - hutaḥ|vAyuḥ|AvRutta̍ ityA - vRuttaḥ|nRucakṣA iti# nRu - cakṣA̱ḥ|pratiKyAta̍ iti prati# - KyAtaḥ|Bakṣaḥ|Agata̍ ityA - gataḥ|pitRuṇAm|nArAśaṃqsaḥ|asuḥ|Atta̍ḥ|sindhu̍ḥ|avaBRuthamitya̍va̍ - BRutham|avaprayannityava̍ - prayann|samudraḥ|avagata̍ ityava# - gataḥ|salilaḥ|prapluta̍ iti pra - plutaḥ|suvaḥ|udRucamityu̍t̍ - Ruca̱m|gataḥ||25 (71) (rudra - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: prajApatirmanasA̍ &ndhO&cCEtO̍ dhAtA dIkṣAyAṃ# savitA BRutyAM pUṣA sOmakraya̍ṇyAM̍ ~Mvaruṇa̍ upanaddhO̍ &suraḥ̍ krIyamAṇO̍ mitraḥ krItaḥ śipiviṣṭa̍ AsAditO̍ naraMdhiṣaḥ̍ prOhyamAṇO &dhipatirAga̍taḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ praṇIyamAnO̍ &gnirAgnI̱ddhrE bRuhaspatirAgnI̱ddhrAt praṇIyamAna̍ indrO# havirddhAnE &ditirAsA̍ditO̍ viṣṇurupAvahriyamAṇO̍ &tharvOpO̱ttO yamO&Biṣu̍tO̍ &pUtapA AdhUyamA̍nO̍ vAyuḥ pUyamAnO̍ mitraḥ kṣIraśrIrmanthI̍ saktuśrIrvai̱śvadEva̍ unnItO̍ rudra ( ) AhutO̍ vAyurAvRuttO̍ nRucakṣAḥ pratiKyAtO̍ Bakṣa Agataḥ̍ pitRuṇAM nArAśaṃqsO̍ &surAttaḥ sindhura-̍ vaBRuthamavaprayanth̍ samudrO̍ &vagataḥ̍ salilaḥ praplutaḥ̍ suvarudRuca̍M̍ gataḥ||25 (rudra - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam kRuttikAḥ|nakṣa̍tram|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|agnEḥ|ruca̍ḥ|stha|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|dhAtuḥ|sOmasya|RucE|tvA|rucE|tvA|dyutE|tvA|BAsE|tvA|jyOti̍ṣE|tvA|rOhiṇI|nakṣa̍tram|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvatA̱|mRugaśIrq.ṣamiti# mRuga - śIrq.ṣam|nakṣatram|sOma̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|ArdrA|nakṣa̍tram|rudraḥ|dEvatA̱|puna̍rvasU̍ iti punaḥ̍ - vasU|nakṣatram|adi̍tiḥ|dEvatA̱|tiṣya̍ḥ|nakṣa̍tram|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|AśrEṣA̍ ityA̱- śrEṣAḥ|nakṣatram|sarpAḥ|dEvatA̱|maGAḥ|nakṣa̍tram|pitara̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|Palgu̍nI̍ iti|nakṣa̍tram|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kRuttikA̍ nakṣatra-magnirdEvatA&gnE̍ rucaḥ̍ stha prajApatErddhAtuḥ̍ sOmasyarcE̍ tvA# rucE tvA̱ dyutE tvA# BAsE tvA jyOtiṣE̍ tvA rOhiṇI nakṣatraM̍ prajApatirdEvatA̍# mRugaśIrq.ṣaM̍ nakṣatraṃq̍ sOmO# dEvatA &&rdrA nakṣatraṃ̍ rudrO dEvatA punarvasU̍ nakṣatramadi̍tirdEvatA̍-̍ tiṣyO# nakṣatraM̍ bRuhaspatirdEvatA̱̍ &&śrEṣA nakṣatraṃ̍ sarpA dEvatA# maGA nakṣatraM̍ pitarO# dEvatA PalgunI̍ nakṣatra̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam aryamA|dEvatA̱|PalgunI̍ iti|nakṣa̍tram|Baga̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|hasta̍ḥ|nakṣa̍tram|savitA|dEvatA̱|citrA|nakṣa̍tram|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|svAtI|nakṣa̍tram|vAyuḥ|dEvatA̱|viśA̍KE̍ iti vi - śAKE|nakṣatram|i̍006C;qdrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|dEvatA|anUrAdhA̍ ityanu̍ - rAdhAḥ|nakṣatram|mitraḥ|dEvatA̱|rOhiṇI|nakṣa̍tram|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|vicRutAviti̍# vi - cRutau̱|nakṣatram|pitara̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|aṣAḍhAḥ|nakṣa̍tram|Apa̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|aṣAḍhAḥ|nakṣa̍tram|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|śrOṇA|nakṣa̍tram|viṣṇu̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|śravi̍ṣṭhAḥ|nakṣa̍tram|vasa̍vaḥ|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -maryamA dEvatA PalgunI̍ nakṣatraM̍ BagO# dEvatA hastO nakṣatraṃ̍ savitA dEvatA# citrA nakṣatramindrO̍# dEvatA̱ svAtI nakṣatraM̍ ~MvAyurdEvatA viśAKE̍ nakṣatramindrAgnI̍ dEvatA# &nUrAdhA nakṣatraM̍ mitrO dEvatA# rOhiṇI nakṣatramindrO̍# dEvatA# vicRutau nakṣatraM̍ pitarO# dEvatA# &ṣAḍhA nakṣatramApO̍# dEvatA# &ṣAḍhA nakṣatraM̍ ~MviśvE# dEvA dEvatA̱ śrOṇA nakṣatraM̍ ~MviṣṇurdEvatA̍ śraviṣṭhA̍ nakṣatraM̍ ~MvasavO̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatA̱|śataBiṣagiti̍# śata - Biṣak|nakṣatram|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|prOṣṭhapadA̍ iti# prOṣṭha - padAḥ|nakṣatram|ajaḥ|Eka̍pAdityEka̍# - pAt|dEvatA̱|prOṣṭhapadA iti# prOṣṭha - padAḥ|nakṣatram|ahi̍ḥ|buddhniya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|rEvatI̱|nakṣa̍tram|pUṣA|dEvatA̱|aśvayujAvitya̍śva̍ - yujau̱|nakṣatram|aśvinau̱|dEvatA̱|apaBara̍ṇIritya̍pa̍ - BaraṇIḥ|nakṣa̍tram|yamaḥ|dEvatA̱|pUrṇA|paścAt|yat|tE|dEvAḥ|ada̍dhuḥ||28̍ (33) (PalgunI̍ nakṣatraM̍ - ~Mvasava̍ - strayastriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: - pUrṇA paścAd>1 yat tE# dEvA adadhuḥ̍ >2 pUrṇA paścAduta pUrṇA purastAdunmadhyataḥ̍ pau̱rṇamAsI jigAya|tasyA̱n̍ dEvA adhi# saM~Mvasanta̍ uttamE nAka# iha mAdayantAM||yattE̍# dEvA adadhu̍ rBAgadhEyamamAvAsyE̍ saM~MvasantO̍ mahitvA|sAnO# yajñaM pipRuhi̍ viśvavArE rayiM nO# dhEhi suBagE suvIra̱M||

verses.padam: - Padam madhuḥ|ca|mAdha̍vaḥ|ca|vAsa̍ntikau|RutU̍ iti|śukraḥ|ca|śuci̍ḥ|ca|graiṣmau̱|RutU̍ iti|naBa̍ḥ|ca|naBasya̍ḥ|ca|vAṛṣi̍kau|RutU̍ iti|iṣaḥ|ca|Urjaḥ|ca|śAradau|RutU̍ iti|saha̍ḥ|ca|sahasya̍ḥ|ca|haima̍ntikau|RutU̍ iti|tapa̍ḥ|ca|tapasya̍ḥ|ca|śaiśirau|RutU̍ iti|agnEḥ|antaḥślEṣa̍ ityantaḥ̍ - ślEṣaḥ|asi|kalpEtAm|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|kalpantAm|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|kalpa̍ntAm|agnaya̍ḥ|pRutha̍k|mama̍|jyaiṣṭhya̍ya|savra̍tA̍ iti sa-vratAḥ|29 (50)
verses.samhita: madhuśca̍ mAdhavaśca̍ vAsantikAvRutU̍ śukraśca śuciśca̍ graiṣmAvRutU̍ naBaśca̍ naBasyaśca̍ vAṛṣikAvRutU̍ iṣaścOrjaśca# śAradAvRutU sahaśca̍ sahasyaśca̍ haimantikAvRutU̍ tapaśca̍ tapasyaśca̍ śaiśirAvRutU agnErantaḥ̍ ślEṣO&si̍ kalpEtAM̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ kalpantAmApa̍ OṣadhIḥ̍ kalpantAmagnayaḥ̍ pRutha~gmama jyaiṣṭhyaya̍ savratA-̍ [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam yE|agnayaḥ|sama̍nasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|antarA|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|śaiśirau|RutU iti|aBIti̍|kalpa̍mAnAḥ|indra̱m|iva|dEvAḥ|aBi|samiti̍|viśantu|saM~Myaditi̍# saM - yat|ca|pracEtA̍ iti pra - cEtAḥ|ca|agnEḥ|sOmasya|sUrya̍sya|ugrA|ca|BImA|ca|pitRuṇAm|yamasya̍|indra̍sya|dhruvA|ca|pRuthivI|ca|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|marutA̱m|varu̍ṇasya|dhartrI|ca|dhari̍trI|ca|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|mitrasya̍|dhAtuḥ|prAcI̱|ca|pratIcI̱|ca|vasU̍nAm|rudrAṇA̱M|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yE̱&gnayaḥ samanasO&ntarA̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ śaiśirAvRutU̍ aBi kalpamAnA̍ indramiva̍ dEvA aBi saM~Mviśantu̍ saM~Myacca pracEtAścAgnEḥ̍ sOmasya̍ sUryasyO-grA̍ ca# BImA ca# pitRuṇAM ~MyamasyEndrasya̍ dhruvA ca# pRuthivI ca# dEvasya# saviturmarutAM ~Mvaruṇasya̍ dhartrI ca dharitrI̍ ca mitrAvaruṇayO̍ rmitrasya# dhAtuḥ prAcI# ca pratIcI# ca vasUnAṃ̍ rudrAṇA# - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAnA̱m|tE|tE|adhipataya̍ ityadhi-patayaḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|nama̍ḥ|tE|naḥ|mRuḍayantu|tE|yam|dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣṭi̍|tam|vaḥ|jaMBE̱|dadhAmi|sahasra̍sya|pramEti̍# pra - mA|asi|sahasrasya|pratimEti̍# prati - mA|asi|sahasrasya|vimEti̍# vi - mA|asi|sahasrasya|unmEtyu̍t̍ - mA|asi|sAhasraḥ|asi|sahasrAya|tvA|imAḥ|mE|agnE|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|dhEnava̍ḥ|santu|EkA̱|ca|śatam|ca|sahasra̱m|ca|ayuta̱m|ca|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mAdityAnAM tE tE&dhipatayastEByO̍ namastE nO# mRuḍayantu tE yaM dviṣmO yaśca# nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvO jaMBE# dadhAmi sahasrasya̍ pramA asi̍ sahasrasya̍ pratimA asi̍ sahasrasya̍ vimA asi̍ sahasrasyOnmA̍ asi̍ sAhasrO&si̍ sahasrAya̍ tvEmA mE# agna iṣṭakA̍ dhEnavaḥ̍ santvEkA# ca śataM ca# sahasraM̍ cAyutaM̍ ca - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam niyutamiti# ni - yuta̱m|ca|prayutamiti# pra-yuta̱m|ca|arbudam|ca|nya̍rbudamiti̍ ni - arbudam|ca|samudraḥ|ca|maddhya̱m|ca|antaḥ|ca|parAd^^rdha̍ iti# para- ad^^rdhaḥ|ca|imAḥ|mE|agnE|iṣṭakAḥ|dhEnava̍ḥ|santu|ṣaṣṭiḥ|sahasra̱m|ayuta̱m|akṣI̍yamAṇAḥ|RutasthA̍ ityRuta̍ - sthAḥ|stha|RutAvRudha ityRuta̍ - vRudhaḥ|GRutaścuta̍ iti# GRuta - ścutaḥ|madhuścuta̍ iti# madhu - ścutaḥ|Urja̍svatIḥ|svadhAvinIriti̍# svadhA - vinI̱ḥ|tAḥ|mE|agnE|iṣṭakAḥ|dhEnava̍ḥ|santu|virAja̍ iti# vi - rAjaḥ|nAma̍|kAmaduGA̍ iti# kAma - duGA̱ḥ|amutra|amuṣminn̍|lOkE||32̍ (45) (savratA̍ - rudrAṇA# - mayuta~jca̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: niyutaM̍ ca prayutaM cArbudaM̍ ca nyarbudaM̍ ca samudraśca maddhyaM cAntaśca̍ parArddhaścEmA mE# agna iṣṭakA̍ dhEnavaḥ̍ santu ṣaṣṭhiḥ sahasramayuta-makṣI̍yamAṇA̍ RutasthA sthartAvRudhO̍# GRutaścutO# madhuścuta UrjasvatIḥ̍ svadhAvinIstA mE# agna iṣṭakA̍ dhEnavaḥ̍ santu virAjO nAma# kAmaduGA# amutrAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE||32 (savratA̍ - rudrAṇA# - mayuta~jca̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samiditi# sam - it|diśAm|AśayA̱|naḥ|suvarviditi# suvaḥ - vit|madhO̱ḥ|ataḥ|mAdha̍vaḥ|pAtu|asmAn||agniḥ|dEvaḥ|duṣṭarI̍tuḥ|adA̱Byaḥ|idam|kṣatram|rakṣatu|pAtu̍|asmAn||rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|sAmaBiriti̍ sAma# - Biḥ|pAtu|asmAn|gAyatrI|CandasAm|viśvarUpEti̍# viśva - rUpA||trivRuditi# tri-vRut|naḥ|viṣṭhayEti# vi - sthayA̱|stOmaḥ|ahnA̱m|samudraḥ|vAta̍ḥ|idam|Oja̍ḥ|pipartu||ugrA|diśAm|aBiBU̍tirityaBi̍ - BUtiḥ|vayOdhA iti# vayaḥ- dhAḥ|śuciḥ|śukrE|aha̍ni|OjasInA̱||indra̍|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|pipRutAt|ataḥ|naḥ|mahi̍|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samid-diśAmAśayA# naḥ suvarvinmadhOratO mAdhavaḥ̍ pAtvasmAn|agnirdEvO duṣṭarIturadA̱Bya̍ idaM kṣatraṃ rakṣatu̍ pAtvasmAn||rathantaraṃ sAmaBiḥ̍ pAtvasmAn gAyatrI̍ CandasAM̍ ~MviśvarUpA|trivRunnO̍# viṣṭhayA stOmO ahnAṃ# samudrO vAta# idamOjaḥ̍ pipartu||ugrA diśAmaBi-BUtirvayOdhAḥ̍ śuciḥ̍ śukrE ahanyOjasInA̱|indrAdhi̍patiḥ̍ pipRutAdatO# nO mahi# - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam kṣatram|viśvataḥ|dhAraya|idam||bRuhat|sAma̍|kṣatraBRuditi̍# kṣatra - BRut|vRuddhavRuṣṇiyamiti̍# vRuddha-vRuṣṇiyam|triṣṭuBA̱|Ojaḥ|śuBitam|ugravI̍ramityugra̍ - vIram||indra|stOmE̍na|pa~jcadaśEnEti̍# pa~jca - daśEna|maddhya̱m|idam|vAtE̍na|saga̍rEṇa|rakṣa||prAcI̱|diśAm|sahaya̍śA̍ iti# saha - yaśAḥ|yaśasvatI|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|prAvRuṣA̱|ahnA̱m|suva̍rvatIti̍ suvaḥ̍ - vatI||idam|kṣatram|duṣṭara̱m|astu|Ojaḥ|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|sahasriya̱m|sahasvat||vairUpE|sAmann̍|iha|tat|śakEma|jaga̍tyA|Enam|vikṣu|Eti̍|vEśayAmaḥ||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|saptadaśEnEti̍# sapta - daśEna|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kṣatraM ~MviśvatO# dhArayEdaM||bRuhat sAma# kṣatraBRud-vRuddha vRuṣṇiyaM̍ triṣṭuBaujaḥ̍ śuBita mugravIraM|indra̍ stOmEna̍ pa~jcadaśEna maddhyamidaM̍ ~MvAtEna̍ sagarEṇa̍ rakṣa||prAcI# diśAṃ sahayaśA̍ yaśasvatI̍ viśvE# dEvAḥ prAvRuṣA &hnAṃq suvarvatI|idaM̍ kṣatraM duṣṭaramastvOjO̍ &nAdhRuṣṭaṃ̍ sahasriyaṃq sahasvat||vairUpE̍ sAmanniha̍ tacCakEma̍ jagatyainaM̍ ~MvikṣvA vEśayAmaḥ|viśvE̍# dEvAḥ saptadaśEna - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam varcaḥ|idam|kṣatram|salilavA̍tamiti̍# salila - vAtam|ugram||dhartrI|diśAm|kṣatram|idam|dAdhAra|upasthEtyupa̍ - sthA|AśAnAm|mitravaditi̍# mitra - vat|astu|Ojaḥ||mitrA̍varuṇEti̍ mitrA̱ - varuṇA|śaradA̱|ahnA̱m|cikitnU iti|asmai|rAṣṭrAya̍|mahi̍|śarma̍|yacCatam||vairAjE|sAmann̍|adhIti̍|mE|manIṣA|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|saMBRutamiti̍# saM - BRutam|vIrya̱m|sahaḥ||idam|kṣatram|mitravaditi̍# mitra - vat|ArdradAnvityArdra - dAnu|mitrAvaruṇEti̍ mitrA̱ - varuṇA|rakṣatam|Adhi̍patyairityAdhi̍-patyaiḥ||samrAḍiti̍# sam - rAṭ|diśAm|sahasAmnIti# saha - sAmnI|sahasvatI|Rutuḥ|hEmantaḥ|viṣṭhayEti̍# vi - sthayA̱|naḥ|pipartu||avasyuvAtA̍ ityavasyu̍ - vAtAḥ|35 (50)
verses.samhita: varca# idaM kṣatraṃ salilavA̍tamugraM||dhartrI̍ diśAM kṣatramidaM dAdhArOpasthA&&śA̍nAM̍ mitravadastvOja̍ḥ|mitrA̍varuṇA̍ śaradA&hnA̱M cikitnU asmai rAṣṭrAya mahi śarma# yacCataM||vairAjE sAmannadhi# mE manIṣA&nuṣṭuBA saMBRutaM̍ ~MvIryaṃ# sahaḥ|idaM̍ kṣatraM mitravadArdradA̍nu̍ mitrAvaruṇA̍ rakṣata-mAdhi̍patyaiḥ||samrAḍ̍ diśAṃ sahasA̱mnI sahasvatyRutuṛhE̍mantO̍ viṣṭhayA# naḥ pipartu|avasyuvAtA̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhatIḥ|nu|śakvarIḥ|imam|yajñam|avantu|naḥ|GRutAcI̱ḥ|suva̍rvatIti̍ suvaḥ̍ - vatI|suduGEti# su - duGA̱|naḥ|payasvatI|diśAm|dEvI|avatu|naḥ|GRutAcI̱||tvam|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|pura EtEti# puraḥ - EtA|uta|paścAt|bRuhaspatE|yAmyA̱m|yu~ggdhi|vAca̱m||Ud^^rdhvA|diśAm|ranti̍ḥ|AśA̱|Oṣa̍dhInAm|saM~MvathsarEṇEti̍# saM-vathsarEṇa|savitA|naḥ|ahnA̱m||rEvat|sAma̍|ati̍#cCandA̍ ityAti# - CandAḥ|u|Candaḥ|ajA̍taśatrurityajA̍ta̍ - śatruḥ|syOnA|naḥ|astu||stOmatrayastriṃśa̍ iti stOma# - trayastriṃqśE|Buvanasya|patni|viva̍svadvAta̍ iti vivasvat̍ - vAtE|aBIti|naḥ|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhatIrnu śakvarIrimaM̍ ~Myajñamavantu̍ nO GRutAcI̱ḥ||suvarvatI̍ suduGA# naḥ payasvatI̍ diśAM dEvyavatu̍ nO GRutAcI̱|tvaM gOpAḥ puraEtOta̍ paścAd bRuhaspatE̍ yAmyA̱M ~Myu~ggdhi vAca̱M||UrddhvA diśAṃ rantirAśauṣadhInAṃ̍ saM~MvathsarEṇa# savitA nO ahnA̱M|rEvath sAmAticCandA̍ u CandO&jAta̍ śatruḥ syOnA nO# astu||stOmatrayastriṃśE̍ Buvanasya̍ patni vivasvadvAtE̍ aBi nO# - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam gRuṇAhi||GRutavatIti# GRuta - vatI|savitaḥ|AdhipatyairityAdhi̍-patyaiḥ|paya̍svatI|ranti̍ḥ|AśA̱|naḥ|astu||dhruvA|diśAm|viṣṇu̍patnIti̍ viṣṇu# - patnI|aGOrA|asya|IśA̍nA|saha̍saḥ|yA|manOtA̱||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|mAtariśvA̱|uta|vAyuḥ|sandhavAnA̍ iti# sam - dhuvAnAḥ|vAtA̱ḥ|aBIti|naḥ|gRuṇantu||viṣṭaBaM̍ iti# vi-staBaMḥ|divaḥ|dharuṇaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|asya|IśA̍nA|jaga̍taḥ|viṣṇu̍patnIti̍ viṣṇu# - patnI||viśvavyacA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|iṣayantI|suBU̍tiriti̍ su-BUtiḥ|śivA|naḥ|astu|aditiḥ|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE||vaiśvAnaraḥ|naḥ|UtyA|pRuṣṭaḥ|divi|anviti|naḥ̍ ( )|adya|anumatirityanu̍# - matiḥ|anviti|it|anumata̍ ityanu̍ - matE|tvam|kayA̱|naḥ|citraḥ|Eti|Buvat|kaḥ|adya|yu~gktE||37̍ (64) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (raśmirasi̍ - rAjñyasya̍ - yaM purO harikEśO̍ - &gnirmUrddha - ndrAgniByAM - bRuhaspati# - rBUyaskRuda# - syagninA# viśvAṣAṭ - prajApatirmana̍sA̍ - kRuttikA̍ - madhuśca̍ - samiddiśAM - dvAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (raśmirasi̍ - prati# dhEnu- masi̍ stanayitnusanira̍ - syAdityAnAṃ# - saptatriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of Kandam 4 :- (raśmirasi̍ - kO adya yu~gktE)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: - kayA# naścitra ABuvat>7,̍ kO adya yu~gkta̍ >8 kayA# naścitra ABuvadUtI̍ sadA vRudhaḥ̍ saKA̱|kayA śaciṣṭhayA̍ vRutA||kO adya yu~gktE̍ dhuri gA Rutasya śimIvatO̍ BAminO# duṛhRuṇAyUn|AsanniṣUn.̍ hRuthsvasO# mayOBUn. ya EṣAM̍ BRutyAmRuṇadhath sa jIvAt||̍
